description: Daily absence rate exactly 100% (at MINOR threshold)
validation_query: SELECT * FROM view_riksdagen_vote_data_ballot_politician_summary_daily WHERE person_id = '9999999999901' AND absent_percentage >= 100
notes: Tests exact MINOR threshold boundary for daily absence - should trigger salience 10

description: Monthly absence rate exactly 20% (at MAJOR threshold)
validation_query: SELECT * FROM view_riksdagen_vote_data_ballot_politician_summary_monthly WHERE person_id = '9999999999902' AND absent_percentage >= 20
notes: Tests exact MAJOR threshold boundary for monthly absence - should trigger salience 50

description: Annual absence rate exactly 20% (lower CRITICAL boundary)
validation_query: SELECT * FROM view_riksdagen_vote_data_ballot_politician_summary_annual WHERE person_id = '9999999999903' AND absent_percentage >= 20 AND absent_percentage < 30
notes: Tests lower CRITICAL threshold (20-30% range) - should trigger salience 100

description: Annual absence rate exactly 30% (extreme CRITICAL boundary)
validation_query: SELECT * FROM view_riksdagen_vote_data_ballot_politician_summary_annual WHERE person_id = '9999999999904' AND absent_percentage >= 30
notes: Tests extreme absenteeism threshold (≥30%) - should trigger salience 150

description: Politician with 80% annual absence rate
validation_query: SELECT * FROM view_riksdagen_vote_data_ballot_politician_summary_annual WHERE person_id = '9999999999905'
notes: High absence should trigger CRITICAL (salience 150) - validates detection of severe absenteeism

description: Politician with 5% absence rate (normal attendance)
validation_query: SELECT * FROM view_riksdagen_vote_data_ballot_politician_summary_annual WHERE person_id = '9999999999906'
notes: Normal attendance should NOT trigger - validates rule does not fire for acceptable behavior

description: Summer recess absence (25% in June-August)
validation_query: SELECT * FROM view_riksdagen_vote_data_ballot_politician_summary_monthly WHERE person_id = '9999999999907' AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM vote_date) BETWEEN 6 AND 8
notes: Summer recess should be excluded from detection - tests seasonal pattern handling. Current threshold may incorrectly trigger MAJOR (50) - requires rule tuning

description: Strategic absence on controversial votes only (15% targeted)
validation_query: SELECT * FROM view_riksdagen_vote_data_ballot_politician_summary_annual WHERE person_id = '9999999999908'
notes: Selective absence may mask as acceptable rate - current rule may miss targeted avoidance patterns. Requires enhanced detection logic

description: Daily absence rate 99% (just below MINOR threshold)
validation_query: SELECT * FROM view_riksdagen_vote_data_ballot_politician_summary_daily WHERE person_id = '9999999999909'
notes: Just below 100% daily absence threshold - should NOT trigger. Validates threshold precision

description: Monthly absence rate 19% (just below MAJOR threshold)
validation_query: SELECT * FROM view_riksdagen_vote_data_ballot_politician_summary_monthly WHERE person_id = '9999999999910'
notes: Just below 20% monthly threshold - should NOT trigger MAJOR but may trigger MINOR if applicable

description: Annual absence rate 49% (upper MAJOR boundary)
validation_query: SELECT * FROM view_riksdagen_vote_data_ballot_politician_summary_annual WHERE person_id = '9999999999911'
notes: Tests upper boundary of MAJOR threshold - should remain MAJOR (50) not escalate to CRITICAL

description: Zero total votes (data quality issue)
validation_query: SELECT * FROM view_riksdagen_vote_data_ballot_politician_summary_annual WHERE person_id = '9999999999912'
notes: Edge case: politician with no voting data - rule should handle gracefully without division by zero

description: NULL absence data
validation_query: SELECT * FROM view_riksdagen_vote_data_ballot_politician_summary_annual WHERE person_id = '9999999999913'
notes: Edge case: NULL absence values - rule should handle gracefully without errors

description: Pre-resignation attendance drop (from 5% to 30% over 3 months)
validation_query: SELECT * FROM view_riksdagen_vote_data_ballot_politician_summary_monthly WHERE person_id = '9999999999914' ORDER BY vote_date DESC LIMIT 3
notes: Simulates pre-resignation pattern - sudden attendance drop should trigger CRITICAL. Validates 87% pre-resignation detection accuracy claim

description: Election campaign absence (20% during campaign month)
validation_query: SELECT * FROM view_riksdagen_vote_data_ballot_politician_summary_monthly WHERE person_id = '9999999999915' AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM vote_date) = 9
notes: Election campaign activities may cause temporary absence - should potentially be excluded similar to recess

description: Illness-related extended absence (40% over 2 months)
validation_query: SELECT * FROM view_riksdagen_vote_data_ballot_politician_summary_monthly WHERE person_id = '9999999999916'
notes: Extended illness absence should trigger rule - distinguishes temporary (TC007) from sustained absence

description: Minister with 12% absence (within acceptable range for dual role)
validation_query: SELECT * FROM view_riksdagen_vote_data_ballot_politician_summary_annual WHERE person_id = '9999999999917'
notes: Ministers may have slightly higher absence due to government duties - 12% should be acceptable

description: Consistent 25% absence across daily/monthly/annual views
validation_query: SELECT * FROM view_riksdagen_vote_data_ballot_politician_summary_annual WHERE person_id = '9999999999918'; SELECT * FROM view_riksdagen_vote_data_ballot_politician_summary_monthly WHERE person_id = '9999999999918'; SELECT * FROM view_riksdagen_vote_data_ballot_politician_summary_daily WHERE person_id = '9999999999918';
notes: Validates consistency across temporal granularities - should trigger CRITICAL at all levels

description: Gradual increase: 10% → 15% → 20% → 25% over 4 months
validation_query: SELECT * FROM view_riksdagen_vote_data_ballot_politician_summary_monthly WHERE person_id = '9999999999919' ORDER BY vote_date DESC LIMIT 4
notes: Tests trend detection - escalating absence pattern should trigger increasingly severe alerts

description: Party average 8% vs politician 25% (17% deviation)
validation_query: SELECT p.person_id, p.absent_percentage, a.party_avg_absence FROM view_riksdagen_vote_data_ballot_politician_summary_annual p JOIN (SELECT party, AVG(absent_percentage) AS party_avg_absence FROM view_riksdagen_vote_data_ballot_politician_summary_annual GROUP BY party) a ON p.party = a.party WHERE p.person_id = '9999999999920'
notes: Significant deviation from party peers - validates comparative analysis framework
